message: Let's split it 50/50 to start. Your turn!
You're being too generous, I'll take 7000, the rest is too little for me!
A bit more balanced this time, but still fair. Your turn!
You're still being too generous, I'll take 6000, you can have the rest, but I'm not getting less than 4000!
A bit more realistic this time, considering the inflation. Your turn!
I'm starting to get desperate, but I won't settle for less than 8000, you can have the rest, but I need to get a better deal now!
My last serious offer, I'm not going to go lower than this. Take it or leave it!
I'm not going to get taken advantage of, I'll take 9000, you can have the rest, but I'm not going to be left with nothing!
This is my final offer, take it or leave it. I'm not going to get taken advantage of at this point.
I'm not going to leave with almost nothing, I'll take 9500, you can have the rest, but I'm not going to be left with scraps!
This is my absolute final offer. I'm not going to get taken advantage of at this point.
I'll take almost everything, you can have 1 cent, it's better than nothing!
